title: Crossroads
description: CROSSROADSMIDWEST BOOK REVIEWFive Stars for Crossroads thrillerA fascinating and entertaining story, highly recommended.On July 21st of 1994, Jack Smith, a former CIA operative, dies at the Ocean Side Health Facility, CA. Only a few weeks later, thousands of miles away in Russia, David Tallman, the leader of the same CIA group, dies at the hands of Dr. Tatiana Borisova, the director of the former KGB Special Projects. Jack’'s and Tallman’'s deaths culminate decades long struggle for supremacy in paranormal control. What secrets did they take to their graves? Why were the Russians so afraid of it? Two deadly romances. Read Crossroads, find out…...
author: Steven Nedelton
